item.title: Why Reading at Night Is Good for You
item.description: A quiet moment with a book before bed can do more than relax you. Here’s why a bedtime reading habit might be worth building.

item.title: UK study suggests problem gambling quadruples the risk of suicide among young people four years later
item.description: New research has shown how harmful gambling is clearly linked to a marked and long-lasting increase in suicide attempts among young people in the UK.
